quotes.quote: The naked truth is always better than the best-dressed lie.
I'd rather hear an ugly truth, rather than an obscure lie.
Hard truths can be dealt with, triumphed over, but lies will destroy your soul.
The hard truth is that sometimes we need to lie to ourselves to continue to live.
Better by far to embrace the hard truth than a reassuring fable. If we crave some cosmic purpose, then let us find ourselves a worthy goal.
There is some self-interest behind every friendship. There is no friendship without self-interests. This is a bitter truth.
Most jokes state a bitter truth.
I preferred a hard truth to a well-meant lie.
The ability to make hard truths palatable is one that every long-lived co-leader has mastered.
Is it treason to say the truth? A bitter truth, but no less true for that.
Staring down hard truth takes guts.
The naked truth is still taboo.
